name: mini-io-game
description: A minimal real-time .io style multiplayer game (TypeScript, socket.io, canvas)
author: Your Name <you@example.com>

scripts.dev: npm run build:server && npm run bundle:dev && concurrently -k -n s,run,b --prefix-colors blue,yellow,green "cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc -p tsconfig.server.json --watch" "nodemon -q -w dist/server dist/server/server.js" "npm run bundle:watch"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:server && tsc -p tsconfig.client.json --noEmit && npm run bundle:prod && node scripts/hash-bundle.mjs && node scripts/size-report.mjs
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
